name: K-array Azimut KAMUT2L II
headline: Invisible micro-system for premium hospitality rooms
description: Azimut KAMUT2L II is a turnkey micro-system pairing ultra-slim columns with a compact sub and amplifier for design-driven spaces that still expect hi-fi clarity.
story: Created for hotel suites, lounges and concept retail, the KAMUT2L II hides powerful coverage in a décor-friendly footprint, with DSP, connections and presets tucked away in a single electronics hub.
definition: Complete Azimut micro-system with slim columns, compact subwoofer and matched DSP amplifier.
finish: Matte black columns with discreet hardware
drivers: Paired micro line-source columns with matching low-profile subwoofer
specs: Full Azimut system with ultra-slim columns, sub and control electronics
Integrated DSP amplifier with presets for music, speech and background modes
Flexible I/O for TV, streaming devices and background music sources
Wall, shelf and ceiling mounting options for columns
Compact subwoofer sized to hide under furniture or joinery

definition: Single-column Azimut system with compact subwoofer and integrated DSP amplification.
finish: Matte black aluminium column and matching sub
drivers: Single micro column line-source with matching subwoofer
specs: Compact Azimut package with one slim column, sub and control electronics
DSP presets for near-field listening and background sound
Flexible mounting accessories for column placement
Discreet cabling paths and plug-and-play connectivity
Optimised for smaller rooms and listening zones

name: K-array Azimut KAMUT2L14 II

drivers: Taller micro column arrays coupled to a compact subwoofer

name: K-array Firenze KH7P I System
headline: Steerable Firenze array platform for arenas and events
description: The Firenze KH7P I platform combines digitally steerable line-array elements with matching low-frequency support for high-output touring and large-format installs.
story: Engineers can build straight hangs or complex grids with KH7P I modules, steering coverage electronically while anchoring the system with Firenze subs for precise, stadium-grade sound.
definition: Firenze KH7P I line-array system core for digitally steerable touring rigs.
finish: Touring black with Firenze rigging hardware
drivers: Multi-way Firenze array modules with dedicated LF support
specs: Digitally steerable line-array modules for 3D coverage control (with system DSP)
Compact frontal footprint with high power density
Optimised to pair with Firenze KS subs and amplifiers
Rigging system for fast, repeatable deployment
Weather-resistant touring enclosure construction
coverage: Digitally steerable vertical and horizontal coverage

name: K-array Firenze KH8 System

story: With KH8, crews fly straight arrays, plug in power and network, and shape coverage from software, dramatically cutting rigging time in arenas, stadiums and festivals.
definition: Self-powered Firenze touring system with electronic beam steering capability.
finish: Black touring finish with weather protection
drivers: Multi-way Firenze modules with onboard multichannel amplification
specs: Self-powered array elements with multichannel Class D amplification

Straight-array rigging for rapid deployment
Compatible with Firenze KS low-frequency modules
Networkable control for presets, monitoring and optimisation

name: K-array Firenze KS7P I System

story: Stacked under KH7 or KH8 arrays, KS7P I modules create a powerful low-frequency foundation that can be tuned cardioid or end-fired via system processing.

finish: Touring black polyurea on steel frame
drivers: Dual 21" sub modules driven by external Firenze amplifiers
specs: Dual 21" sub modules optimised for Firenze amplifier presets

Heavy-duty frames and hardware for truck-friendly touring
Designed to integrate visually with KH7/KH8 hangs
Suitable for indoor and outdoor high-SPL deployments
